Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Indaco Charleston Reservations Hours & Location 526 King St, Charleston, SC 29403 (843) 727-1229 indaco@theindigoroad.com Sunday - Thursday: 5 - 10 p.m.Friday + Saturday: 5 - 11 p.m. Dinner Saturday + Sunday: 10 a.m. - 2:30 p.m. Weekend Brunch Monday - Friday: 5 - 7 p.m. Happy Hour, available at the bar Facebook Instagram *Please note that we do not offer valet service; parking behind the building is monitored by a third party and is not affiliated with Indaco or The Indigo Road Hospitality Group. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating West Palm Beach Coming Soon Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Hours & Location 905 N Railroad Avenue, West Palm Beach, FL 33401 Hours Coming Soon Located in the vibrant Nora District of West Palm Beach, Indaco (Italian for “indigo”) brings the flavors of Italy to a dynamic new community. The menu showcases wood-fired pizzas, hand-crafted pastas, and house-made sausages, available family-style or à la carte. Guests can pair their meals with a thoughtfully curated wine list emphasizing Italian varietals, signature cocktails, local brews, and spirit-free options. Nora breathes new life into historic railway warehouses, blending character and innovation to create a cornerstone for contemporary West Palm living. Indaco’s inviting atmosphere aligns seamlessly with this vision, offering a front-row seat to the art of Italian cooking. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Indaco Atlanta Reservations Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Hours & Location 725 Ponce De Leon Ave NE Suite 250, Atlanta, GA 30306 (404) 205-5183 indacoatlanta@theindigoroad.com HOURS Bar Monday - Friday: Opens at 4 p.m. Dinner Sunday - Thursday: 5 – 10 p.m Friday + Saturday: 5 – 11 p.m. Weekend Brunch Saturday + Sunday: 11 - 2:30 p.m. Indaco Café [Grab-and-Go Options with Self-Serve Seating] 8 a.m. - 2:30 p.m. Monday - Friday: Order Pickup Catering Menu LOCATION Indaco is located on the office lobby level of the 725 Ponce building, accessible from the main building entrance off of Ponce de Leon or North Avenue, and from the Atlanta BeltLine Eastside Trail. INDACO ATLANTA Located on the BeltLine, Indaco offers a blend of elevated and casual dining with a modern, Italian menu. Enjoy house-made pastas and wood-fired pizzas along with classic piatti, a fresh cocktail menu and an Italian-forward wine list. For press inquiries, please contact Laura Craft at lecraft@theindigoroad.com Facebook Instagram PARKING Guests have the option of complimentary self-parking, with parking tickets validated by request after your meal. Self-parking is located below the 725 Ponce building. Valet parking is available Thursday through Saturday. Kroger parking is monitored by a third party and is not affiliated with Indaco or The Indigo Road Hospitality Group. Please call us if you need extra assistance with parking/directions. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Indaco Greenville Reservations Hours & Location 40 W Broad Street, Greenville, SC 29601 (864) 326-4817 Indacogreenville@theindigoroad.com Sunday - Thursday: 5 - 10 p.m.Friday + Saturday: 5 - 11 p.m.Saturday + Sunday: 11 a.m. - 2:30 p.m. Dinner Weekend Brunch Monday - Friday: 4 - 6 p.m.Saturday + Sunday: 3 - 5 p.m. Aperitivo Hour, at the outdoor bar *Limited menu available. Outdoor bar open weather permitting. Indaco Greenville Indaco Greenville seamlessly blends both elevated and casual dining with an airy, Italian-inspired menu. Indulge with hand-made pasta and wood-fired pizzas, alongside an exciting cocktail menu and an Italian-forward wine list. Enjoy Indaco favorites in our main dining room, or dine al fresco on our covered outdoor patio with access from Main Street. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Indaco Alys Beach Slide 1 of 3 Slide 2 of 3 Slide 3 of 3 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Hours & Location 40 Mark Twain Lane Suite 101, Alys Beach, FL 32461 Hours Coming Soon Italian in Alys Beach Steps from the Gulf and at home in the heart of Alys Beach, Indaco brings the flavors of Italy to Florida’s Emerald Coast. The space blends coastal charm with Indaco’s signature warmth, inviting guests to linger over hand-crafted pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and shared plates best enjoyed with friends. Whether you’re joining us for a casual evening or a special occasion, the atmosphere is always one of community and connection. Stay Connected Be the first to know about opening updates, special dinners, and events unique to Alys Beach. Sign up for our emails and never miss a reason to gather at the table. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Indaco Nashville Coming Soon Slide 1 of 9 Slide 2 of 9 Slide 3 of 9 Slide 4 of 9 Slide 5 of 9 Slide 6 of 9 Slide 7 of 9 Slide 8 of 9 Slide 9 of 9 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Hours & Location 1408 Adams Street, Nashville, TN 37208 indaconashville@theindigoroad.com Hours Coming Soon Indaco Nashville At Indaco, we celebrate the spirit of Italian dining, bold flavors, shared plates, and a love for bringing people together. Our Nashville home carries that same energy, with a lively bar, an open kitchen framed by counter seating, and a patio made for lingering over cocktails and conversation. Set in the heart of Germantown, this location blends neighborhood charm with Indaco’s signature warmth. Whether you’re here for a quick spritz or a long, pasta-filled evening, you’re in the right place. Be the First to Know Get insider access to Indaco Nashville. Sign up for our mailing list and be the first to hear about our opening date, exclusive pre-opening events, and priority to our first reservations.
